name: com.lavapals.ultutils
description:
ADD 'BLXRCOMP' AS A DEPENDENCY TO THIS PROJECT AS WELL TO PREVENT SCRIPT ERRORS! https://github.com/holadivinus/BLXRComp.git

Adds utilities for working with UltEvents to the context menus in the inspector, hierarchy and project window.

samples.description: Contains example prefabs that make use of UltSwapping.
